general_info.summary: This text outlines various aspects related to SUAT 2025, including sample papers, recruiter information, and guidelines for banking, postal services, visas, FRO/FRRO, medical insurance, and observership programs. It also highlights "Paramarsh," a mentoring portal, and details potential career paths after a nursing course, such as Staff Nurse, Nurse Educator, Medical Researcher, and Psychiatric and Mental Health Nurse, encouraging readers to take the next step in their nursing career.

Take the next step towards a career in nursing.
